body_html:
It's probably giving back an unexpected buffer format:
03-22 11:01:12.200 9698-9717/org.tensorflow.demo D/ImageReader_JNI: ImageReader_imageSetup: Overriding buffer format YUV_420_888 to 32315659. 32315659 maps to NV12.

What is the android.info.supportedHardwareLevel on your device? Some devices don't fully support the camera2 api, unfortunately, and emulate it problematically internally.

If you press the volume keys you'll turn on debug mode, which will render the image being processed. Might be helpful to see what that looks like in each of the demos.

If you press the volume keys you'll turn on debug mode, which will render the image being processed. Might be helpful to see what that looks like in each of the demos.
body:
It's probably giving back an unexpected buffer format:
`03-22 11:01:12.200 9698-9717/org.tensorflow.demo D/ImageReader_JNI: ImageReader_imageSetup: Overriding buffer format YUV_420_888 to 32315659.` 32315659 maps to NV12.

What is the `android.info.supportedHardwareLevel` on your device? Some devices don't fully support the camera2 api, unfortunately, and emulate it problematically internally.

If you press the volume keys you'll turn on debug mode, which will render the image being processed. Might be helpful to see what that looks like in each of the demos.
